text:
Hey ya’ll! I have a client who’s looking for a *freelance junior content writer* for some blogs. Here are the project specs:

• *Deliverables*: 4 blogs/ month (1,000-1,500 words each)
• *Pay*: £250 each (£1,000/ month) 
• *Industry*: B2B eCommerce (experience in this niche is not necessary, but the writer should know how to do extensive research)
• *Start date*: January ’22 (indefinite contract, assuming all goes well)
• *Few words on the client*: He’s super easygoing and pays on time. This would be a great opportunity for a junior writer who’s interested in getting experience in the industry.
There will be a paid trial blog to kick things off.

If interested, *please DM me 2-3 of your best writing samples by Friday, 11/26* (only via Slack, please). If you have someone in mind who would be a good fit, let me know as well.

PLEASE NOTE: This client is only looking for _serious_ candidates. He’s had issues in the past with writers not turning in work on time, compromising quality as the months pass, etc. (I may be saying this in vain, but) if you know these are tendencies of yours, please do _not_ apply.

Thanks! :blush:

text:
I’m looking to get some freelance help with designing original infographics/visuals for the blog at <http://veed.io/learn|veed.io/learn>. I’d love to have 1-2 people I know I can reach out to whenever there’s a blog that’s more design-heavy than our usual content (how-to’s with screenshots).

Anyone here have a freelance designer they’ve worked with and recommend?

text: Hey there! Looking to chat with a couple of freelance writers about how you price your services. It's for a blog post I'm working on. Shoot me a DM if you have 5-10 minutes to spare over the next day or two. Thanks!

text:
Hi! I’m a B2B tech content strategist and I started building my freelance consulting business this year after over a decade in the corporate world. I’m piloting a mini thought leadership kickoff program to help companies start turning the technical expertise of their employees into great content over the course of a week. 

Think of it like a low-risk way to find out what stories are hidden in the brilliant minds of developers, engineers, researchers, data scientists and other people who are critical to what your company sells.

I started doing these sessions a couple weeks ago and it’s been so much fun to help people pull out stories and perspectives they didn’t realize they had... and then weave them into a company's marketing efforts. If anyone’s interested, would love to chat!

Love this idea! I'm not your target audience but I'm also a content strategist and would love to know more about the concept if you're open to sharing. I'll be expanding my services next year and I'm not targeting hardcore tech companies :slightly_smiling_face:
Happy to share what I'm doing in exchange!

text:
Hey everyone! :wave: I lead merchant storytelling for North America at Shopify :shopping_bags: Looking to connect with writers who specialize in data-driven case studies (<https://www.shopify.com/plus/customers|like these>) and videographers to film video case studies/short features (<https://player.vimeo.com/video/605149194|like these>). Some perks:
• Get to hear from inspiring entrepreneurs who are following their passions 
• Learn about ecommerce and D2C tech trends 
• Informal working relationship with myself and my team!
• Content written by humans, for humans (no corporate jargon or fluff)
Feel free to DM me and we can go from there! :hugging_face:
***Must be based on North America

text:
Hello everyone. 

Q1 is right around the corner, do you need new copy? If your: 

:white_check_mark: Web copy

:white_check_mark: Landing pages
 
:white_check_mark: Sales emails, or

:white_check_mark: Sales pages 

Look like they need a refresh, I can help you out.

I mine & organise your customer data to create a solid messaging strategy to engineer high converting copy.

My writing process covers:

:star2:Data mining & research, and market analysis 
:star2:Writing, editing & optimizing 
:star2:Testing (A/B, Multivariate) and validation 

So if you're interested in getting new copy or refreshing your current copy, send me a DM and let's see how I can help!

P.S: I also appreciate if you would please refer my services to a friend or biz buddy who needs new copy. Thank you.
